title: Rhea Seehorn | Trump Loses it After Jan. 6 Hearing Reveals Embarrassing Speech Outtakes: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Donald Trump claiming to be the most persecuted individual in American history after last week’s bombshell hearing of the January 6 committee embarrassed him by airing never-before-seen outtakes of his speech from the day after the insurrection.

Then, Rhea Seehorn talks about celebrating her Emmy nomination, working with Carol Burnett on Better Call Saul and sharing a house with Bob Odenkirk and Patrick Fabian.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
